item.title: Project 2: Star Classifier
item.description: Star Type Classification I have a “Star dataset to predict star types” data set (from kaggle: Deepraj Baidya: Kaggle Link In this dataset each row represents a specific star and the columns represent specific parameters about that star. This dataset has 7 columns and 240 rows. The goal of this project was to try and predict what kind of star it will be based off of certain parameters. Modules Used import warnings import numpy as np import pandas as pd import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.

item.title: Project 1: Pokemon Attack Linear Regression Model
item.description: Below is the first Machine Learning project i have ever attempted. This simple project was created using Octave. One of my friends gave me this dataset to practice my Machine Learning skills. This dataset contains 800 different pokemon from the various games throughout the years. What I have done is used the HP, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed of the Pokemon as my features. The goal is to use those features to predict the Attack of the Pokemon.
